body.raw:
Prerequisites

Prerequisites To use DenoCord

1. [Deno](https://deno.land/) must be installed on your machine. 2. Familiar with [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) (if you want to use DenoCord with Typescript). 3. Deno extension for Your Code Editor. You can read more about it [here](https://deno.land/manual/vscode_deno) 4. Knowledge of ES6 syntax. Like `async/await`, `callbacks` etc. If you already know [Discord.js](https://discord.js.org/) it will help you as the api of denocord so similar to discord.js.
